name: Santa Slay
description:
Santa is under attack by a wave of zombies! Santa must wield his swords and slay his foes without remorse.

Santa Slay is a simple 2D game where the aim is to kill as many enemies as possible to score points without dying.

Controls

W,A,S,D or Arrow Keys - Move

Space Bar - Jump

Left Mouse Button - Attack

Right Mouse Button - Switch Sword

Enemies

Zombie Santa's can be sent back to their wintery grave using Santa's Gingerbread Sword

Zombie Gingerbread Men can be sent back to the oven using Santa's Candy Cane Sword

Purple enemies are worth extra points but are rarer than their normal counterparts

Traversal

Wall Jump

To start a wall jump, jump onto a wall. To climb the wall, move in the opposite direction and jump.

Ladders

To climb a ladder, press the up arrow or W key to ascend. Press the down arrow or S key to descend. You can also jump of ladders.

Have fun and thanks for playing!
